full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS PHYAG DANG MCHOD PA 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA RGYA SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHE NAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, ^GSER KHANG RI KHROD PAS BRAG DKAR BDE LDAN GLING NAS SBYAR BA'O, ,DAD LDAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS, PHA MAS THOG DRANGS MA RGAN 'GRO BA KUN, MYUR DU BLA MED BYANG CHEN THOB PHYIR TU, SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
